synthesis_conditions.reference: Ferrando-Soria, J.; Pasán, J.; Ruiz-Pérez, C.; Journaux, Y.; Julve, M.; Lloret, F.; Cano, J.; Pardo, E.; Inorg. Chem. 2011, 50, 8694.

synthesis_conditions.method: slow diffusion in a H-shaped tube at room temperature
heating H2O@iso1 at 125 °C for 30 min under N2
synthesis_conditions.TGA: mass loss of ca. 30% at 125 °C corresponds to 60 H2O molecules per formula unit

synthesis_conditions.method: immersion of iso1 in methanol for 30 min
introducing iso1 into a sealed capillary tube filled with CO2 or CH4, respectively, at a pressure of 1 bar
